snippet: The software behind the tiny padlock next to web addresses that promised to protect sensitive data is broken, a team of security researchers has discovered.
abstract: The software behind the tiny padlock next to web addresses that promised to protect sensitive data is broken, a team of security researchers has discovered.

headline.main: Experts Find a Door Ajar in an Internet Security Method Thought Safe
headline.print_headline: Thought Safe, Websites Find the Door Ajar
